channel.title: Posts on Brian Barkley's website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Brian Barkley's website

item.title: Announcing the WeCountCOVID19.com Survey (Part 1)
item.description: I am excited to announce that the WeCountCOVID19.com survey is live! I’m so excited for this, in fact, that I’m writing a blog post for the first time in more than a year! Skip down to to bottom to learn about how the survey came to be, and my work with Code for Milwaukee. About the WeCountCOVID19.com survey The WeCountCOVID19.com survey aims to count every single Wisconsinite who is possibly infected by the coronavirus.

item.title: Hack & Tell: Data Science in MKE
item.description: This website is now live! I spent several hours at Rokkincat’s Hack & Tell reading more about blogdown and netflify, and toying with a few settings. One big thing that I’ve been wanting to do is start a catalogue of the data science activities in Milwaukee. There is a lot of beauty in Milwaukee, and also a lot of need. The MKE community also has many talented professions working Saturdays on side projects and hobbies that make Milwaukee a better place.

item.title: Hello, Blogdown
item.description: Back to it Hi all, I’m excited to get back to social media! I took a short break in 2018 to earn my PhD, move across the country, and start my career in data science. I’m happy to report that Kohl’s is treating me well, and I am excited for what we have planned.
